Body: Personally, I don't think the new Devourer armor ain't that bad... Sure I'll point out that it needs to be a little bit more purple and and have a bit more armor depth... But I genuinely don't mind it at all, dunno why people need to overreact so much over NEW ARMOR.. also I dunno where to post this... Soooo I'ma roll the dice and plop it into Daily Heartlands News' comments
